tool.name: RAVE
tool.command: ./rave.pl --tool_directory $__tool_directory__ --bfile ${plinkdb.fields.path} #if $filter_var.subpopulation == 'yes': --keep ${filter_var.population_select.fields.path} #end if #if $filter_individuals.individual == 'file': --keep ${filter_individuals.variety_file} #else if $filter_individuals.individual == 'list': --variety_list "${filter_individuals.variety_list}" #end if #if $filter_loc.location == 'file': --extract range ${filter_loc.location_file} #else if $filter_loc.location == 'list': --location_list "${filter_loc.location_list}" #end if #if $filter_locus.locus == 'file': --extract range ${filter_locus.locus_file} #else if $filter_locus.locus == 'list': --locus_list "${filter_locus.locus_list}" #end if --maf $maf --output_format $output_format --out $plink_output

param.name: plinkdb
param.label: Select plink DB
param.help: If your dataset of interest is not listed, contact us

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: maf
param.label: Minor allele frequencies
param.help: --maf filters out all variants with minor allele frequency below the provided threshold (default 0.01)

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: individual
param.label: Filter SNP based on individual (This parameter can be empty)
param.option: Upload a file from your history

param.name: variety_file
param.label: Variety list from file
param.help: One range per line, whitespace-separated (i.e : B001 B001)

param.name: variety_list
param.label: Variety list from area
param.help: One range per line, whitespace-separated (i.e : B001 B001)

param.name: location
param.label: Filter SNP based on genomic location (This parameter can be empty)
param.option: Upload a file from your history

param.name: location_file
param.label: Range list from file
param.help: One range per line, whitespace-separated (i.e : 1 100000 120000 chr1)

param.name: location_list
param.label: Range list from area
param.help: One range per line, whitespace-separated (i.e : 1 100000 120000 chr1)

param.name: locus
param.label: Filter SNP based on specific locus (This parameter can be empty)
param.option: Upload a file from your history

param.name: locus_list
param.label: Locus list from area (MSU locus name)

param.name: output_format
param.label: Select output format
param.help: --recode creates a new text fileset, after applying sample/variant filters and other operations.
